question: A Graticule is the name given to:-

choices.choice: A series of lines drawn on a chart
A series of Latitude and Longitude lines drawn on a chart or map
A selection of small circles as you get nearer to either pole

subject: Navigation

question: Given that the compression value of the Earth is 1/297 and that the semi-major axis of the Earth, measured at the axis of the Equator is 6378.4 km, what is the semi-major axis of the Earth measured at the axis of the Poles?
subject: Navigation

question: What is the approximate compression of the Earth?
subject: Navigation
